title: The Fastest Way of getting rid of LeaverBuster?
body: You must be learning how to get rid of LeaverBuster the quickest way. Now you must know how the leaverbuster system works, the LeaverBuster activates when a player is afk(away from keyboard) or when a player quits a match. As seen in the Buster's 'description' it says "being afk or disconnecting from games is a punishable offence in League of Legends." it also says "You have been placed in a lower priority queue due to your actions." which makes you wait X amount of minutes, and it puts you in that queue for 5 matches once 5 the matches have been completed you will no longer be in the lower priority queue. If you didn't get what i said here is a simplified one (hopefully you understand this one) You will be placed in a lower priority queue for being afk or disconnecting a match, and you will need to wait X amount of minutes so that you can join the matchmaking queue and you will spend 5 matches in the lower priority queue. Once the 5 matches have been completed will you no longer be in the lower priority queue. Now here is the thing, it said that you MUST play 5 games in match making games including custom games to get rid of your leaver buster. So what you do it create a custom match get ONE friend in the game play for about 7-10 minute tell you buddy to surrender and this message MIGHT pop up "you have 4 matchmaking games in the lower priority queue.

replies.body: This system is **not accurate** enough for all the players who leave a match while it is in progress. There are some causes as to why a player has to leave a match, In my area - sometimes while playing a match, issues like Electricity supply disconnections(No light), or even Internet Troubles me and forces me to turn off my PC even tho I don't want to leave the game. Once the issue is fixed, most of the time the match is over and guess what? I'm placed in a low priority queue. Many players suffer from the same issue, This is why I say that this system is not accurate enough. Sure it can bust 1000 players who leave the game but the reason why they did so,** Does not matter's** to this system and they are placed in a low priority queue.
